kittys.name: Hello Kitty
kittys.bio: Hello Kitty is very energetic, bright, and friendly.
kittys.likes: Traveling, music, reading, making new friends, and eating cookies

kittys.name: Kuromi
kittys.bio: Kuromi is a tomboy, but behind her tough appearance, she is actually very girly.
kittys.likes: Romantic short stories, food, shallots, meat, black, hot pink, purple, making mischief

kittys.name: My Melody
kittys.bio: My Melody is a very honest, good-natured girl. Her favorite food is almond pound cake.
kittys.likes: Crafts and loves baking cookies with her
